name: Jammer Dash Level
summary: A JDL file contains information about a level for Jammer Dash, a 2D rhythm video game (in beta development). It stores information in the JSON standard that Jammer Dash references to load a level (e.g., the position of objects in the level or metadata , including the creator and level difficulty). Jammer Dash allows players to download and upload JDL level files from and to its server to share levels with others.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
